Package org.apache.calcite.adapter.java

Class AbstractQueryableTable

java.lang.Object
org.apache.calcite.schema.impl.AbstractTable
org.apache.calcite.adapter.java.AbstractQueryableTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryableTable, Table, Wrapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
CassandraTable, ElasticsearchTable, GeodeTable, InnodbTable, JdbcTable, ListTransientTable, MongoTable, ViewTable
public abstract class AbstractQueryableTable
extends AbstractTable
implements QueryableTable
Abstract base class for implementing Table.
